players.name: Bob
memory:
Diana: "Bob is the mafioso and he killed Alice.
I am saying this because I investigated him last night."
Diana: "I have evidence that Bob is the mafioso. I investigated him last night and found proof of his guilt."
You: "I am innocent and I have no idea what Diana is talking about. She must be lying."
Charlie: "I am innocent and I have no idea what Diana is talking about. She must be lying."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
